mapper.select: SELECT I.USER_EMAIL,I.BUDGET_TITLE,I.PERSONNEL,I.BUDGET,I.FITNESS,I.DATE,I.LIKE_COUNT,L.PRO_ID,L.PRO_NAME,L.QUANTITY,L.PRICE FROM BUDGET_INFO I, BUDGET_LIST L WHERE I.USER_EMAIL=#{user_email} AND I.BUDGET_TITLE=#{budget_title} AND L.USER_EMAIL=I.USER_EMAIL AND L.USER_EMAIL=I.USER_EMAIL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUDGET_INFO(USER_EMAIL, BUDGET_TITLE,PERSONNEL, BUDGET, FITNESS,DATE,LIKE_COUNT) VALUES(#{user_email},#{budget_title},#{personnel},#{budget},#{fitness},date(now()),#{like_count});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BUDGET_INFO WHERE USER_EMAIL=#{user_email} and BUDGET_TITLE=#{budget_title};
DELETE FROM BUDGET_LIST WHERE USER_EMAIL=#{user_email} and BUDGET_TITLE=#{budget_title} and PRO_ID=#{pro_id};
